meanings.definition: Of or relating to an eighth part or division.
meanings.sent1: The cake was cut into octantal slices for all the guests to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The octantal division of the pie made it easy to share among the family.
meanings.sent3: The octantal pieces of the puzzle fit together perfectly, revealing the hidden picture.
meanings.sent4: Her octantal approach to organizing her closet made it look neat and spacious.
meanings.sent5: The octantal pattern on the quilt was intricate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: A fraction equal to one eighth.
meanings.sent1: She added an octantal of the total amount to calculate her share of the bill.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for an octantal of a cup of sugar to sweeten the dish.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly asked for an octantal of the pizza, knowing it was too small a portion.
meanings.sent4: The octantal of the company's profits was allocated for charity donations.
meanings.sent5: An octantal of the students in the class preferred math over other subjects.
